content: The yield keyword doesn’t appear to be documented on https://buildbot2.rust-lang.org/. How can we fix that?

@Jake Goulding it is not a keyword. :smile:

so @bors retry yield just retries the same pr, but because it has a lower priority than the one we are yielding to, it causes a yield. The yield in there is just a message to the author/reviewer/and anyone else checking the pr so that they know it isn't the current one which is running.

That said, it wouldn't be bad to have a @bors yield command
well it's not a bors keyboard :smiley:
Ok, the notakeyword isn’t documented. Now insert the rest of my message.
